snippet.title: The Chosen Well of Souls Unboxing (PC) ENGLISH
snippet.description:
The Chosen: Well of Souls

Developer: Rebelmind
Release Year: 2006
Genre: Action RPG
Platform: PC
Edition: US

mobygames.com: The story revolves around 3 characters: Frater Simon, Elena, and Tong Wong (respectively mage, thief, and warrior), who are members of the Mystery Guards Fraternities, organizations devoted to exterminating demons and dark forces. They are now after an immortal sorcerer, Marcus Dominus Ingens, who commands armies of demons, summoned with the souls of alchemists and is bent on destroying God's Envoy, a powerful being who appears every 200 years.
